metadata.title: The Brand That Broke All Marketing Rules | Zudio Marketing Case Study
metadata.description:
In this video, we uncover Zudio's genius marketing strategy and explore how this offline-only retail brand has disrupted India's fashion landscape.

From their strategic store locations to their unique pricing model, we'll discover how ZUDIO has redefined fast fashion for Gen-Z consumers.

Using real market analysis, we dive deeper and understand Zudio's deliberate absence from premium big city areas and their strategic decision to remain offline. Through comparative analysis with other fashion
